dialogue.htmlContent:
#IF(lilaya.getLocationPlaceType()==PLACE_TYPE_LILAYA_HOME_LAB)

Lilaya's laboratory is located in this particular corner of the house, and as you approach it, you see that the door has been left wide [style.colourGood(open)]. With no physical barrier blocking your way, you could simply step forwards and enter the lab, or continue on your way and choose to come back at another time.

#IF(!flags.hasFlag(FLAG_acexp_lilaya_daily_voyeurism))

As you stand before the door to Lilaya's laboratory, a lewd idea forms in your mind. Your demonic aunt and her cat-girl maid are always up to something whenever you enter, and you could try to sneak up on them and see for yourself what they're doing. All it would take is to move very quietly, and once you're inside, you're sure that you could find a good spot from which to observe them...

#ENDIF #ELSE

Lilaya's laboratory is located in this particular corner of the house, and as you approach it, you see that the door has been firmly [style.colourBad(closed)]. Considering the current hour, it's most likely that your [lilaya.relation(pc)] and her cat-girl maid have both retired to their rooms in order to get a good night's sleep. If you wanted to discuss something with Lilaya, you'll have to come back later during the day.

#ENDIF

As you approach the door to Lilaya's lab, you notice that it's been firmly pulled shut. A little piece of paper has been stuck on it, and you see that your demonic [lilaya.relation(pc)] has left you a handwritten note:

#IF(lilaya.isCondomBroke()) Hey [pc.name], I know the condom breaking wasn't your fault, but I need some time alone. I don't want anyone seeing me pregnant. Come back later after I've given birth. #ELSE Hey [pc.name], would you kindly fuck off and give me some time alone? I don't want anyone seeing me pregnant, especially not you! Come back later after I've given birth. #ENDIF

Letting out a defeated sigh, you decide to do as the note asks, and step back from the door.

[style.italicsBad(It doesn't look as though you're going to be able to get back in until Lilaya's pregnancy has run its course. Maybe Rose could help?)]

As you approach the door to Lilaya's lab, you notice that it's been firmly pulled shut. A little piece of paper has been stuck on it, and you see that demonic [lilaya.relation(pc)] has left you a handwritten note:

#IF(lilaya.isCondomBroke()) Hey [pc.name], I may have overreacted a little, but this really is all your fault for buying cheap crappy condoms. I'm keeping this door locked until I know if I'm pregnant or not. #ELSEIF(lilaya.isAmazonsSecretImpregnation()) Hey [pc.name], I thought you could do with taking some time to think about what 'don't use Amazon's Secret next time you fucking asshole' could possibly mean. I'm keeping this door locked until I know if I'm pregnant or not. You'd better hope I'm not. #ELSE Hey [pc.name], I thought you could do with taking some time to think about what 'pull out next time you fucking asshole' could possibly mean. I'm keeping this door locked until I know if I'm pregnant or not. You'd better hope I'm not. #ENDIF

Letting out a defeated sigh, you decide to leave Lilaya alone for now, and step back from the door. It looks like you'll just have to wait until she's calmed down before seeing her again...

You find yourself walking towards the door to Lilaya's laboratory, and as you get closer, you see that it's once again been left wide open. Realising that Lilaya's pregnancy must now have been resolved, you wonder if you should enter her lab right now, or continue on your way and choose to come back at another time.

As Lilaya hasn't seen you since you were transformed into a demon by Lyssieth, you ready yourself for the worst as you step through the open doorway into her lab.

On the opposite side of the room, you see your demonic [lilaya.relation(pc)] sitting at one of the long lab tables, busily performing an experiment. Noticing your entry out of the corner of her eye, she looks across and shoots you a furious glare, before starting to stand up. As she gets to her feet, you notice that she has a flat belly, so although there's still the issue of you being a demon at hand, at least the issue of her pregnancy has been resolved.

As Lilaya hasn't seen you since you were transformed into a demon by Lyssieth, you ready yourself for the worst and step through the open doorway into her lab.

On the opposite side of the room, you see the half-demon who's now your demonic [lilaya.relation(pc)] sitting at one of the long lab tables, busily performing an experiment. Noticing your entry out of the corner of her eye, she looks across and shoots you a furious glare, before standing up and marching over to you.

[lilaya.speech(I simply do not even know what to say!)] she yells in a shrill voice, before contradicting her statement by continuing, [lilaya.speech(I already heard from Meraxis via the resonance stone all about what mommy did! A full demon?! I didn't believe her at first! H-How could you?!)]

[pc.speech(How else am I to defeat the other elder lilin without a demon's power?)] you respond with your own question as you try to reason with Lilaya. [pc.speech(Surely you can see how this is for the best?)]

[lilaya.speech(Oh, I can see how it's for the best alright,)] Lilaya replies, crossing her arms and letting her voice take on a sinister, icy tone, [lilaya.speech(For my entire life, I've been begging mommy to turn me into a full demon, but no matter what I said, she always refused, telling me that she'd sworn never to turn anyone into a demon ever again. Now that she's quite clearly proven that her word means nothing, she has no choice but to finally give me what I want.)]

[pc.speech(Lilaya, please, there's no-)] you start to reason, finding your [lilaya.relation(pc)]'s cold, calculating voice to be of some concern, but you're not able to get even one sentence out before her composure breaks.

[lilaya.speech(No!)] she screams, [lilaya.speech(I won't hear any of it! Both you and mommy have betrayed me, so you can make it up to me by convincing her to finally turn me into a real demon! I hate being a half-demon! I hate it!)]

Although most of her anger seems directed at your now-shared mother, Lilaya is definitely more than a little upset with you. As you're wondering whether to agree with her demands and convince Lyssieth to transform her into a full demon, she continues, #IF(lilaya.getTotalTimesHadSex(pc)>0) [lilaya.speech(And don't think for one second that I'm going to let you fuck me again until you agree to do as I say!)] #ELSE [lilaya.speech(And don't think for one second that I'm going to offer you any special tests until you agree to do as I say!)] #ENDIF

Knowing that demonic transformations are permanent, you wonder what you should choose to say...

Stepping inside Lilaya's laboratory, you quickly scan the interior for any sign of life.

On the opposite side of the room, you see your demonic [lilaya.relation(pc)] sitting at one of the long lab tables, busily performing an experiment. Noticing your entry out of the corner of her eye, she looks across and glares angrily at you, before starting to stand up. As she gets to her feet, you notice that her movements are slightly unusual, and as she steps around the table that she was working at, you see the cause of her clumsy motions taking the form of a clearly swollen belly.

[lilaya.speech(Yes, that's right!)] she angrily shouts, before marching over towards you. #IF(lilaya.isCondomBroke()) [lilaya.speech(You ended up getting me pregnant! This is all your fault for using such cheap, crappy condoms! Why couldn't you have just pulled out instead?!)] #ELSEIF(lilaya.isAmazonsSecretImpregnation()) [lilaya.speech(You ended up getting me pregnant! I told you to pull back before you orgasmed! I knew this would happen!)] #ELSE [lilaya.speech(You ended up getting me pregnant! I told you to pull out! I knew this would happen!)] #ENDIF

Not giving you a chance to talk, she continues furiously scolding you, before launching into the reason as to why she's so upset to be pregnant, [lilaya.speech(You know I'm just a half-demon! That means all my kids end up as imps! Do you have any idea of how embarrassing and shameful it is to be called an 'imp-breeder', or 'imp-fucker'?! Do you?!)]

As you start to answer in the negative, Lilaya suddenly whacks you on the arm, and, with tears in her eyes, she shouts, [lilaya.speech(Get out! Get out!)]

You try to apologise as your furious [lilaya.relation(pc)] marches you over to the door of her lab, but your words fall on deaf ears. With one last furious yell, she pushes you out into the corridor, before slamming the door shut and locking it behind you.

[style.italicsBad(It doesn't look as though you're going to be able to get back in until Lilaya's pregnancy has run its course...)]

Stepping inside Lilaya's laboratory, you quickly scan the interior for any sign of life.

On the opposite side of the room, you see your demonic [lilaya.relation(pc)] sitting at one of the long lab tables, busily performing an experiment. Noticing your entry out of the corner of her eye, she looks across and narrows her eyes at you, before standing up and marching over to where you're standing.

[lilaya.speech(You're a very lucky [pc.girl],)] she firmly states as she approaches, [lilaya.speech(As you can see, I'm not pregnant. You'd have been in so much trouble if I was!)]

#IF(lilaya.isCondomBroke()) [pc.speech(Well, it wasn't my fault the condom broke. Everything worked out fine in the end anyway,)] you say, sensing that Lilaya's anger won't last. #ELSE [pc.speech(Everything worked out fine in the end then,)] you say, sensing that Lilaya's anger won't last. #ENDIF

True enough, she lets out a resigned sigh as you say that, and, lowering her voice, she continues, [lilaya.speech(Yes, it did. As we only ever give birth to imps, it's extremely embarrassing and shameful for half-demons to get pregnant. Even those who know that I'm the recognised daughter of Lyssieth herself would call me 'imp-breeder' or 'imp-fucker' behind my back... I hate being pregnant!)]

Reassuring your [lilaya.relation(pc)] that everything's ok, you walk her back over to her lab table, where she lets out one final sigh and says that she forgives you for not pulling out like she asked. As her thoughts turn back to the sex which the two of you had, Lilaya starts hungrily staring at your body, and, with a sultry tone in her voice, she traces a finger over your chest and asks, #IF(lilaya.isCondomBroke()) [lilaya.speech(Now that you're here, would you like me to run some more tests? With the condition that you've got a proper condom this time, or that you'll be sure to pull out...)] #ELSE [lilaya.speech(Now that you're here, would you like me to run some more tests? With the condition that you'll promise not to get me pregnant, of course...)] #ENDIF

You wonder if you should take her up on that offer, or discuss some other business with her...

Stepping inside Lilaya's laboratory, you quickly scan the interior for any sign of life.

On the opposite side of the room, you see your demonic [lilaya.relation(pc)] sitting at one of the long lab tables, busily performing an experiment. Noticing your entry out of the corner of her eye, she looks across and narrows her eyes at you, before standing up and marching over to where you're standing.

[lilaya.speech(I've decided to forgive you,)] she firmly states as she approaches, and as she comes to stand before you, you take note of the fact that her belly is flat once again. [lilaya.speech(As you can see, I've given birth, and the imps that you got me knocked up with are no doubt out there in Submission somewhere, causing trouble for everyone! They even tried stealing some of my lab equipment as they left...)]

[pc.speech(Sorry for the trouble,)] you say.

#IF(lilaya.isCondomBroke()) Your [lilaya.relation(pc)] lets out a resigned sigh as you say that, and, lowering her voice, she continues, [lilaya.speech(Yes, well, I've already forgiven you. It wasn't really your fault that the condom broke. Just know now that I hate being pregnant, so don't let this happen again.)] #ELSEIF(lilaya.isAmazonsSecretImpregnation()) Your [lilaya.relation(pc)] lets out a resigned sigh as you say that, and, lowering her voice, she continues, [lilaya.speech(Yes, well, I've already forgiven you. Just know now that I hate being pregnant, so when I say pull back before you orgasm, I mean it.)] #ELSE Your [lilaya.relation(pc)] lets out a resigned sigh as you say that, and, lowering her voice, she continues, [lilaya.speech(Yes, well, I've already forgiven you. Just know now that I hate being pregnant, so when I say pull out, I mean it.)] #ENDIF

Reassuring your [lilaya.relation(pc)] that you now appreciate how much she dislikes being pregnant, you walk her back over to her lab table, where she lets out one final sigh and says that she really did try to warn you about pulling out. As her thoughts turn back to the sex which the two of you had, Lilaya starts hungrily staring at your body, and, with a sultry tone in her voice, she traces a finger over your chest and asks, #IF(lilaya.isCondomBroke()) [lilaya.speech(Now that you're here, and that whole business is behind us, would you like me to run some more tests? With the condition that you've got a proper condom this time, or that you'll be sure to pull out...)] #ELSE [lilaya.speech(Now that you're here, and that whole business is behind us, would you like me to run some more tests? With the condition that you'll promise not to get me pregnant, of course...)] #ENDIF

You wonder if you should take her up on that offer, or discuss some other business with her...

Stepping inside Lilaya's laboratory, you quickly scan the interior for any sign of life.

On the opposite side of the room, you see your demonic [lilaya.relation(pc)] sitting at one of the long lab tables, with her back to the door. Open books and sheets of paper litter the tabletop and floor around her, but she seems far more interested in something other than work at the moment. Rose is straddling her lap, leaning in against Lilaya's chest as she whispers down to her demonic mistress. You see your [lilaya.relation(pc)]'s hand reaching up Rose's skirt, and from the movement of her arm, you can tell that she's fingering her cat-girl maid.

Before you can say anything, you hear some surprising words coming out of Rose's mouth as she moans down into Lilaya's ear,
[rose.speech(~Mmm!~ That's right, you horny little slut. ~Aah!~ Come on, please your Mistress!)]
[rose.speech(~Mmm!~ That's right, slut. ~Aah!~ Do a good job, and maybe this'll be the year I let you fuck me!)]
[rose.speech(~Mmm!~ Come on, slut, you can do better than that! ~Aah!~ Yes, get those fingers in deeper!)]
[rose.speech(~Ooh!~ You dirty little slut! ~Mmm!~ That's right, focus on my clit a little more!)]
[rose.speech(~Ooh!~ Yes, that's it, slut, focus on my clit! ~Mmm!~ Maybe I'll let you use your tongue tonight!)]

Rose hooks her arms around Lilaya's neck and leans back, letting out a deep moan as her owner's fingers continue working away between her legs. She suddenly notices you out of the corner of her eye, and, turning to give you an evil grin, she pointedly grinds down against your demonic [lilaya.relation(pc)], before letting out a little eek and jumping to her feet as she feigns surprise. [rose.speech(M-Mistress! [pc.NameIsFull] here!)]

Lilaya, upon hearing that, mirrors her maid's movements and jumps out of her chair. [lilaya.speech([pc.Name]! E-Erm, w-we were just... Doing an experiment! Yes! Isn't that right, Rose?!)]

[rose.speech(Yes, Mistress!)] Rose squeaks in agreement, [rose.speech(That's right!)]

Brushing down her skirt, Lilaya blushes a little and clears her throat, [lilaya.speech(~Ahem!~ Well, it's a good job that you came here to see me, [pc.name]. Rose has already told me all about your little adventure in my room with my underwear. So, what do you have to say for yourself?)]

As you're indebted to Lilaya for allowing you to live here, you see no other option but to apologise. Stepping forwards, you make up an excuse and say, [pc.speech(I'm sorry, Lilaya. I don't know what came over me. It must be this arcane aura of mine... or something...)]

[lilaya.speech(Hmm... Well, I've already told you that you're not getting any sex from me until you help me convince mommy to turn me into a full demon. As you're quite clearly desperate for it, perhaps you should just do as I say already!)] Lilaya exclaims in her sternest voice.

You wonder if you should agree to convince Lyssieth to permanently transform Lilaya into a full demon, or just ask about some other business...

Rose hooks her arms around Lilaya's neck and leans back, letting out a deep moan as her owner's fingers continue working away between her legs. [lilaya.speech(Hmm... Well, if you find yourself feeling like that, there's no need to sneak off into my room. J-Just come back here and I-I can run some tests on you! O-Ok?)] Lilaya responds, trying her best to sound stern and in control, but ultimately failing as her thoughts shift to wanting to do lewd things with you.

[pc.speech(Yes, Lilaya,)] you respond, much in the same way you always used to with your aunt Lily.

[lilaya.speech(So, now that that's out of the way, what is it you need?)]

As you approach the door to Lilaya's lab, you hear the distinctive sound of your demonic [lilaya.relation(pc)]'s voice getting louder and louder, [lilaya.speech(...and I told you three times already! Don't touch my notes!)]

Stepping through the open doorway, you see a rather flustered-looking Arthur sitting down on one of the lab's many chairs, his eyes cast to the floor as he endures your angry [lilaya.relation(pc)]'s furious scolding. [arthur.speech(Sorry, Lilaya, I just thought that-)]

[lilaya.speech(Be quiet!)] Lilaya shrieks, before suddenly noticing your entry. [lilaya.speech(And now the other asshole's here! [pc.Name]! Come and take a seat, this instant!)]

Looking down at your [lilaya.relation(pc)]'s stomach, you see the reason why she's addressing you in such a furious manner; her belly is quite visibly swollen, making it obvious that you've ended up getting her pregnant. Knowing from experience that it's best to just do as you're told when your [lilaya.relation(pc)] is like this, you walk over to the chair next to Arthur and sit down.

Addressing you, Lilaya shouts, [lilaya.speech(You know I'm just a half-demon! That means all my kids end up as imps! Do you have any idea of how embarrassing and shameful it is to be called an 'imp-breeder', or 'imp-fucker'?! Do you?!)]

Not even giving you a chance to answer, she continues in the same furious tone, [lilaya.speech(Once this business with Arthur is sorted out, I don't want to see you anywhere near my lab until my pregnancy is resolved!)]

Knowing from experience that it's best to just do as you're told when your [lilaya.relation(pc)]'s like this, you walk over to the chair next to Arthur and sit down. Looking up at Lilaya's flat stomach, you see that you didn't end up getting her pregnant after all, and, seeing what it is you're glancing at, she firmly says, [lilaya.speech(Yes, luckily for you, I'm not pregnant. You'd have been in so much trouble if I was!)]

[lilaya.speech(Be quiet!)] Lilaya shrieks, before suddenly noticing your entry. [lilaya.speech([pc.Name]! Please come in and take a seat!)]

Knowing from experience that it's best to just do as you're told when your [lilaya.relation(pc)]'s like this, you walk over to the chair next to Arthur and sit down.

Lilaya starts pacing back and forth, her eyes fixed on Arthur as she explains the situation to the two of you, [lilaya.speech(It's just impossible. Absolutely impossible! I might need your help in order to figure out how to return [pc.name] to [pc.her] world, but I simply cannot be around you for longer than five minutes!)]

[arthur.speech(Lilaya, please, how many times to I have to say I'm sorr-)] Arthur starts, before being cut short by a sudden exclamation from your [lilaya.relation(pc)].

[lilaya.speech(You wouldn't have had to say sorry even once if you could have just refrained from fucking my mother! And right here in my lab of all places!)] Lilaya shouts, her cheeks burning red from embarrassment and anger. With a dismissive swipe of her hand, she turns to you and demands, [lilaya.speech([pc.Name], you're going to help Rose clear out my lab's storeroom so that it can be converted into a bedroom for Arthur! I simply can't endure having this insufferable cheating bastard in my presence for more than a few minutes at a time!)]

Finding yourself in an increasingly awkward position, you realise that your only real option is to agree to do as your [lilaya.relation(pc)] asks...

Having forgotten what it was that Lilaya deduced about Elle's location, you ask your [lilaya.relation(pc)] if she can remind you of where you should be looking for her. Letting out an exasperated sigh, Lilaya pushes her glasses up onto the bridge of her nose and sharply states, [lilaya.speech(She's going down into the Bat Caverns, remember?! Just travel down to the west side of Submission to get there!)]

#IF(game.isSillyMode()) As you start to thank Lilaya for her help, she steps forwards and bonks you over the head with a rolled-up stack of papers.
